rukus.text: Zai zi qi de qingzhuang zhi xia zhong tianshi shi qi siwang de ren, zhong tianshi biding wen tamen shuo:“Shengqian nimen shi zai shenme qingzhuang zhi xia ne!” Tamen shuo:“Women zai difang shang shi bei ren qifu de.” Tamen wen:“Nandao an la de dadi bushi kuankuo de, neng rong nimen qianyi de ma? Zhe deng ren de guisu shi huo yu, na shi yige elie de guisu
Wei lao ruo he furu, tamen ji wuli qianyi, you bu renshi daolu
Zhe deng ren, an la huoxu raoshu tamen. An la shi zhi shu de, shi zhi she de

Shei wei zhu dao er qianyi, shei zai da dishang faxian xuduo chulu, he fengfu de caiyuan. Shei cong jia zhong chuzou, yu qian zhi an la he shizhe nali, er zhongtu siwang, an la bi baochou shei. An la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de
